page.title: 19Redlynch Questionnaire 2
page.content: The 45 completed questionnaires showed that the place of employment for eleven of the inhabitants was the Redlynch/Lover area.Six people worked in Downton and five in Salisbury. Eight other entries named various other places of employment and eight were retired. Only one person used public transport regularly,eighteen used it sometimes. The remainder indicated that they never used it. Thirty people shopped for food in Salisbury,sixteen in Redlynch, seven in Downton.The remainder went to Southampton and other places.Salisbury was the place where most clothes purchases were made.Three people bought clothes in Southampton. Of the churchgoers twenty attended St Mary's,three St Birinus and three the Methodist church.
